text: an unnamed police officer from st. ann , missouri , has been relieved of duty and suspended indefinitely after he was caught on camera pointing an assault rifle at a protester , in ferguson , on tuesday night . the officer was supposed to part of the effort to keep the peace , but instead two separate videos uploaded to youtube on wednesday show him pointing a semi-automatic assault rifle at protestors and shouting : ` i will f ****** kill you .
